apps.name: Funnalyzer
apps.description: Live dashboard for tracking FUNNAI protocol treasury balances using CaffeineAI and on-chain data.

apps.name: FunnAI-Lympics
apps.description: FunnAI challenge tracker, recent winner tracker and mAIner performance tracker with olympic medal style leaderboards. Built using CaffeineAI and on-chain data.

apps.name: Chat With FunnAi & AiConfucius
apps.description: Got a burning question? Ready for a challenge? Chat with and get ready to have a blast with AiConfucius! Dive into deep conversations, tackle the latest FunnAI Challenges, and get wise, witty answers from the ultimate AI philosopher. It's time to play with purpose.

apps.name: Tetric
apps.description: Fall into the timeless challenge of Tetris, now with a new twist! Drop, rotate, and clear lines (watch for funnAi and Caffeine Ai lines :) in a race with gravity. Connect with fellow players in the in-app chat to share strategies, celebrate victories, and master the blocks together.

apps.name: Aira's Pandemonium
apps.description: Aira's Pandemonium is a community-driven NFT game where players mint, stake, and care for digital parrots, earning NEST token rewards and participating in future FunnAI-powered competitions.

apps.name: Funnai Oracle Advisor
apps.description: Advanced AI-driven advisory tool with predictions and price alerts based on funnAI on-chain data. Built using CaffeineAI.

apps.name: Flapp-AI
apps.description: Flapp-AI is a fun, arcade style mobile/desktop game built for the funnAI community. Players take control of a parrot and avoid obstacles in space while competing for the highest score. PLayers can choose different characters, including Aira the parrot herself who has her own personal map where she goes mining in a spiky cave for even more fun. The game has mining themes to fit funnAI's identity and its fun gameplay encourages players to compete for the highest spot on the leaderboard. It's like Flappy Bird but even better; also the funnAI logo is included in the game and clicking on it will take you to the website.

apps.name: ðŸ¦œ Angry Aira ðŸª™ XTC Blaster
apps.description: A 2D physics-based game inspired by Angry Birds where players launch XTC coins from a slingshot to destroy structures and defeat enemies. Features a complete game experience with menus, level progression, scoring system, and enhanced visual effects.

apps.name: FUNNAI Mint Status & Explorer
apps.description: FUNNAI Mint Status & Explorer displays the minting activity of FUNNAI tokens over the past 6 hours, showing up to 250 mint transactions. Users can also search by Principal ID to check the latest FUNNAI token balance.
